location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map of the canals in the Hydrabad Collectorate'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:1492 x 925 mmFoliation:The map has been foliated in the top right hand corner with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Imprint:Lithographed at the Bombay Education Society's Press. Signed John Beatty B.A.C.E. 3rd Executive Engineer C.D. In charge Canal Duties H.C.Distinctive Features:Map of the Hydrabad Collectorate [province of Sindh, Pakistan] showing the canals and roads with districts outlined in colour and explained in a key provided below the title. Contains two tables of reference listing canals with mileage reported; and another giving classification of roads (cleared, formed, drained at intervals, partly bridged, bridged throughout).
